description: This quick and easy lamb kofta recipe is perfect for alfesco dining or for a no-fuss weeknight dinner.
keywords: Kofta,Seafood free,Lamb,Egg free,Spring,Video,Low sugar,High protein,High fibre,Mince,Tomato,Peanut free
name: BBQ Lamb Kofta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs harissa Middle eastern spice blend
1 medium Lebanese cucumber, peeled into ribbons

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mince, onion and harissa into a large bowl. Divide kofta mixture into 12 even portions. Shape into ovals and place onto a plate.
Heat a barbecue or large frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Lightly spray koftas with oil and cook, turning regularly, for 6 minutes or until cooked through.
Toss together salad kit, cucumber and tomato in a bowl, then arrange on a platter. Top with kofta, dollop over yoghurt and serve with tortillas.
